summary: A young, naive Hollywood studio assistant finally turns the tables on his incredibly abusive producer boss.
cast: Kevin Spacey|Frank Whaley|Michelle Forbes|Benicio Del Toro|T.E. Russell|Roy Dotrice|Matthew Flint|Patrick Fischler|Jerry Levine|Sabryn Genet|Kyle Reed
keywords: black comedy|scene of the crime|assistant|boss|movie producer
title: El factor sorpresa
